All functions

cacheCUIResponse()

Cache API CUI Response

cacheSQL()

Cache SQL Statement

cacheSearchResponse()

Cache API Search Response

connectLocalMT()

Connect to a local Metathesaurus Instance

dcLocalMT()

Disconnect a Local Metathesaurus Instance

dc_local_umls()

Disconnect MySQL 5.5 UMLS Database

filter_for_loinc()

Filter MRCONSO output for LOINC

filter_for_nci()

Filter MRCONSO output for NCI

filter_for_pt()

Filter MRCONSO output for preferred_term

filter_for_rxnorm()

Filter MRCONSO output for RXNORM

filter_for_snomed()

Filter MRCONSO output for SNOMED

Load API CUI Response

loadCacheSQL()

Load Cached SQL Statement

loadCacheSearchResponse()

Load Cache API Search Response

queryAttributes()

Query for source definition

queryCUI()

Queries cui in UMLS in MRCONSO table of metathesaurus

queryExact()

Query based on search terms

queryLike()

Query based on search terms

queryString()

String Style Query

query_cui_inverse_relationships()

Query for source definition

query_cui_relationships() query_cui_relationships()

Query for source definition

query_cui_semantic_types()

Query for source definition

query_cui_source_context()

Query for source definition

query_phrase_combo()

Query based on search terms

query_word()

Query MRXW_ENG table for word and return matching CUI and SUI values in MRCONSO

return_all_possible_cuis()

Returns all possible atoms associated with a single phrase search, either like or exact

return_all_semantic_types()

Get all unique semantic types in Metathesaurus

searchCUI()

Gets the most current information about a CUI via API call

search_api()

UMLS API Search of a String

submitQuery()

Submit Query for data retrieval from local umls

umls_api_auth()

Authenticate UMLS REST API

umls_api_parse_response()

Takes the response object from the UMLS API Call and parses it into a dataframe
